analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham rūpim dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na arūpī dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na arūpī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham arūpim dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na arūpī ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na arūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha
